transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Javed sir Namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar boliye sir.
Customer: Manish Sharma baat kar raha hun sir India Mart ke office se aapka account manager.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Kaise hain sir?
Executive: Sab badhiya ekdam.
Customer: Kal call kiya tha kya sir ye aapke pass call gayi thi kya?
Executive: Nahi mere pass kisi ki call nahi gayi.
Customer: Call nahi aayi thi aapke pass?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Achcha achcha koi baat nahi mere pass dikha raha hai ki aapke pass call aayi thi ya gayi thi gayi aise kuch karke dikha raha hai. Maine isliye call kiya tha na sir ek mere pass ek category aa rahi hai refract refractable roof sir.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Retractable nahi hai retractable roof hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To ye retractable roof mein apna dealing rehti hai na sir?
Executive: Retractable?
Customer: Ab main ispe ispe spell out kar deta hun sir ek minute de dijiye R E T R A
Customer: R E T R A C T A B L E sir retractable roof hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Isme apna deal rehta hai na sir?
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: To retractable roof se mujhe sir teen char photo mil jayenge kya?
Executive: Main photo de dunga aapko.
Customer: Line pe rahiye ek bar apna whatsapp number boliye na sir.
Executive: 93
Customer: 93
Executive: Zero
Customer: Zero
Executive: Six
Executive: Seven
Customer: 67 wala hai sir 674152.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Theek hai main maine bheja tha hi sir aapne us din bhi reply nahi kiya tha aaj mujhe ispe na retractable ha retractable ki sari aap mujhe details de dijiyega theek hai iske alava mujhe kya chahiye sir wo bhi bata deta hun ek minute rahiye.
Customer: Sir wo apna aisa hai sir jaise PDF type ka hai kuch voucher vagera jahan pe hamari company kis kis structure mein kam karti hai waha pe sare customer ek bar mein view kar sake sir.
Customer: Google pe mil jaye ki JM trader jo hai kis prakar ke product line ya kis prakar ki services ke andar ya kaun kaun se structure ke andar kam karta hai ya banata hai aisa kuch PDF hai sir hamare pass voucher vagera.
Executive: Aisa to sir PDF nahi hai mere pass.
Customer: Aisa koi PDF nahi hai. Nahi nahi. Ek kam kariyega jaise na aapke janne wale honge cyber cafe wale ya computer wale theek hai na sir hai na to inse boliyega ye jyada nahi 50 lenge sir wo bana denge na JM trader ke naam se boliyega banane ke liye jisme aapka contact detail sara address vagera bhi rahe iske alava jo jo aap service provide karate hain unki aapko kuch unko photo bhi deni padegi theek hai wo badhiya tarike se badhiya tarike se customize karke wo bana denge theek hai 50 ya 90 50 se 100 ke beech mein lenge sir aur wo na aapke liye permanent ho jayega iska fayda kya hoga indirectly main bata deta hun for example man lijiye kal ko sir koi customer naye customer ko ya thoda kam padhe likhe customer ko sir apna link agar bejte hain na catalog link to wo us pe click karne se darta hai sir hai na ji wo sochta hai ki pata nahi mera paisa kat jayega ki kya hi ho jayega correct hai na sir lekin wahin pe agar Javed sir aap is customer ko browser ya PDF bejenge na wo turant open karega ki yaar ek PDF aaya open karke dekho correct hai to isse kya hoga ki wo aapke work work process ko samajh payega usko clarity mil payegi ki aap kis kis prakar ke sale ke andar ya structure ke andar kam karte hain pehli cheez to ye dusri cheez us PDF ko main sir India Mart pe bhi promotion karunga aapka jitna pura catalog pe main wo PDF lagaunga so that koi bhi customer sir jab bhi aapka catalog open karega India Mart pe wo catalog se wo PDF automatic dikha hua wo click karega to uske sari cheeze mile matlab ek ek service ke liye wo check karega ya ek structure shade ke liye dekhega usse aapke sare kam ke process usko dikh jayenge ki aap gazebo bhi banate hain sir membrane banate hain tensile umbrella outdoor shade car parking shade sabhi prakar mein kam karte hain hai na to ek to pehla fayda hoga ki jo wo dhund raha hai wo mil gaya dusra fayda ye hua ki aane wale time mein usko agar kisi prakar ki service ki requirement ho gayi to uske pass wo PDF uske mobile mein save rahega jisme aapka contact detail address rahega already usko kahin to and fro nahi karna hai turant waha se ja ke nikalega aapko contact karega teesra fayda sir man lijiye uske janne wale hain sir jo man lijiye ki wo shade sale banwana chahte ho fabricator shade sale banwana chahte hain to wo directly wo aap PDF usko bhi share kar dega ki aap dekho ye hai Javed ji jo hai is area se rehne wale hain wo baat kar baat kar lo aap unse matlab ek link chain bhi ban jayega aapka customer se ek wo PDF banane se matlab bahut fayde hai.
Executive: Chalo main PDF banwa deta hun aur kya.
Customer: Ha possible ho to banwa ke mujhe whatsapp pe de dijiyega abhi photo manga hai na sir uska photo bhi de dijiyega theek hai main abhi photo abhi photo deta hun main thoda yaha hu iske alava mujhe na mujhe mobile mein sir jitni photo hongi na 20 25 aapke matlab jis product line mein kam karte honge wo bhi sare de dijiyega mujhe kuch aur isme na designing karni hai badhiya se sir theek hai wo main laga dunga theek hai theek hai theek hai okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
Customer:
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs photos of retractable roofs.

- Customer wants a PDF brochure of company services.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to send photos on WhatsApp.

- Executive suggested creating a PDF brochure locally.

- Executive offered to promote the PDF on IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send photos and WhatsApp number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- retractable roof, pdf, brochure, whatsapp, photos
